title: I love GOT7. Let's say I become a JYP trainee and I end up seeing them, must I walk away or should I approach them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course if you want to become a trainee you have to do your work and not approach them first, but if it happens you should try and then see how they speak to you, deducting from that you'll can or not continue your relationship with them.🤗🙃💜
